title: Designs by Nature Gems - Handmade Raw Crystal Jewelry
author: Laura Sultan
description: Designs by Nature Gems specializes in handcrafted raw crystal jewelry. Designed for men and women, who want to protect and heal their energies with the powerful crystals. Find your birthstone crystal necklace, ring, earrings, and much more in our handmade jewelry store.
cleaned_text: Designs By Nature Gems started because of my love for crystals and their energy. With each piece you'll see on this website, I hope to help you connect with nature and its healing power. We are happy to answer any questions, and help you find the right piece or gift. Send us a message! We offer free shipping on all orders over $50 USD to over 25+ Countries, including USA and Canada. With different chain options, options to add an extra birthstone or create a completely custom piece. "Absolutely amazing necklace. By far the best i have ever seen or worn. If you are into crystals, raw stones, or any wire wrapped pendant, i would most definitely recommend." "The communication was great, as always, and the final result is stunning. I will be wearing my new necklace as often as I can." "I got this for my nephew and he loves it! This was made specifically for him after he chose the stone he liked best." "One of a kind, wouldn't trade it for anything." "Truly unique and well crafted, without question the best gift I could have found for someone special.."
